channel.title: seasonings/salt on dalton newbend
channel.description: Recent content in seasonings/salt on dalton newbend

item.description: ingredients 1.5 cups butter or shortening 2 cups brown sugar 1/2 cup molasses or maple syrup 2 eggs 4.5 cups oat flour 4 tsp baking soda 1 tsp salt instructions cream butter, sugar, molasses, and egg until fluffy sift together flour, soda, and salt mix everything together. form small balls and roll in sugar bake for 12 min in preheated oven cool on drying rack for 10-15 min spread [[cheem cream]] lightly on two cookies and sandwich together notes

ingredients 300 g flour 13 g sugar 5 g sea salt 1 cup cold butter ~ 1 cup ice water instructions mix dry ingredients, kneed in butter slowly add in water roll out to 1/4" thick. save leftover for top bake at 400 for 15 min pull from oven, add pie crust weights, bake another 10-15 min notes

ingredients 425 g roasted pumkin puree 400 g caramelized milk 2 eggs 1 egg yolk 3 g ground cinnamon 2 g ground ginger 1 g ground clove 6 g vanilla 2 g sea salt 1 g fresh ground nutmeg instructions mix together puree, [[caramelized milk]], eggs, and spices pour into pie crust notes
